definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: The two companies are discussing the details of the distributorship agreement.
sentences.chinese: 兩家公司正在討論代理權合約的細節。

sentences.english: The company won a contract and hired one hundred new staff.
sentences.chinese: 公司贏得了這個合約，於是新僱用了一百名員工。

sentences.english: He affixed his seal to the contract.

sentences.chinese: 多達60%的人拒絕執行峯會合約。

sentences.english: The company's contract with the city was rescinded in January.
sentences.chinese: 該公司與底特律市的合約在1月份被廢除。

sentences.english: How will you react if he asks you to sign a pre-nup ?
sentences.chinese: 如果他要你簽訂婚前合約，你會怎樣反應呢？

sentences.english: Armies of consultants are employed as contractors across Whitehall for years.
sentences.chinese: 白廳多年來都合約聘傭了相當數量的諮詢師。

sentences.english: The boss is still mad about losing the  contract.
sentences.chinese: 老闆丟了合約怒氣未消。

sentences.english: The Wrights chose to pursue sales contracts and did not compete for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 萊特兄弟選擇追求買賣合約，因此並沒有參與角逐。

sentences.english: No team can offer him more then the MLE the first few years.
sentences.chinese: 沒有球隊在第一個賽季後就能提供給他超過中產合約。

sentences.english: It is the trade body for contract publishers.
sentences.chinese: 該協會的會員是一些合約出版商。

sentences.english: An example of quasi-contract can be found in the Wikipedia website .
sentences.chinese: 有關準合約的例子，請參閱維基百科。
這些合約很快就要滿期。

sentences.english: The development of the responsibility contract is central in this paper, so I will defer a more detailed discussion to a later section.
sentences.chinese: 承包合約是這篇文章的重心所在，我稍後才詳論。

sentences.english: But the efficiency of this kind of exogenous credit contract is not high.
sentences.chinese: 但是這種外生性信貸合約的效率卻不高。

sentences.english: This order was awarded under a five-year contract originally signed in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 訂單早在2005年簽署的五年合約中提及。

definition: property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
to sign a contract or agreement
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to renew or extend a contract
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
